name: Pascals super cooles menu
recipes:
TITLE:  simple salad 
 INGREDIENTS: 
- 236.59 ml salad 
- 236.59 ml vegetables 
 DIRECTIONS: 
- prepare veggies to your liking - slice, dice, julienne, etc- i just chop mine. 
- put salad in large serving bowl. 
- top with veggies. 
- dress with your favorite toppings. do not drown in dressing. it just masks the fresh flavors of the salad and veggies. 
- enjoy! 
 CALORIES:  27.2 
 FAT:  0.1 
 CARBS:  6.0 
 PROTEIN:  1.3 
 PREP TIME:  5 
 TYPE:  appetizer 
 DIET:  vegan 
 TITLE:  lemon chicken orzo soup 
 INGREDIENTS: 
- 236.59 ml chicken broth 
- 118.29 ml rotisserie chicken, shredded 
- 29.57 ml orzo pasta 
- 29.57 ml carrots, shredded or chopped 
- 1/4 stalk celery 
- 1/4 small onion 
- 1/4 clove garlic 
- 15.92 ml lemon juice 
- 1/4 egg 
- salt and pepper 
 DIRECTIONS: 
- in slow cooker, combine broth, chicken, pasta, shredded carrots, and seasoning. 
- cook on high 3 hours or low 6 hours or until pasta is tender. 
- whisk together lemon juice and egg. add a ladleful of hot broth to egg mixture while whisking constantly. return mixture to slow cooker. 
- whisk constantly for a couple minutes to temper the eggs. 
- serve. 
 CALORIES:  228.4 
 FAT:  1.6 
 CARBS:  30.5 
 PROTEIN:  19.2 
 PREP TIME:  10 
 TYPE:  lunch 
 DIET:  contains_meat 
 TITLE:  easy chocolate mousse 
 INGREDIENTS: 
- 56.69 g chocolate 
- 1 tablespoon water 
- 118.29 ml cool whip 
- 3/4 eggs 
- 1/4 tsp salt 
 DIRECTIONS: 
- melt chocolate and cool whip together with water in microwave for 2 minutes on high. stir after first minute. mix well and set aside. 
- beat eggs and salt together until fluffy - about 5 minutes at high speed. fold chocolate mixture into egg mixture. 
- turn into serving bowl and chill until ready to serve. 
 CALORIES:  576.1 
 FAT:  39.3 
 CARBS:  50.2 
 PROTEIN:  10.6 
 PREP TIME:  10 
 TYPE:  desert 
 DIET:  vegetarian

name: mikes victory menu
recipes:
Here is a nutritious and protein-packed breakfast menu that includes two recipes, both of which are quick to prepare:

 TITLE:  protein bread french toast 
 INGREDIENTS: 
- 60 ml (¼ cup) egg whites 
- 2 slices ICON Meals protein bread OR protein bread of choice (140 calories per slice) 
- 1 packet (2 tsp) sweetener 
- 1 tsp cinnamon 
- 5 ml (1 tsp) vanilla extract 
- cooking spray 
- toppings: 60 ml (4 tbsp) low-calorie syrup (20 calories) 
 DIRECTIONS: 
- in a bowl, add egg whites, sweetener, cinnamon, and vanilla extract. whisk until spices are evenly distributed throughout the mixture. 
- heat a griddle over low-medium heat. spray griddle with cooking spray. 
- dip bread slices into egg white mixture, and transfer to pan. 
- spoon any leftover egg white mixture into the bread in the pan. if done slowly, the bread should absorb the mixture and get fluffy. 
- let cook for about 3-4 minutes on each side. 
- remove french toast from the pan and serve on a plate with toppings. suggestions for toppings are fresh fruit and low- calorie syrup. 
 CALORIES:  375.0 
 FAT:  10.0 
 CARBS:  40.0 
 PROTEIN:  43.0 
 PREP TIME:  20 
 TYPE:  breakfast_and_brunch 
 DIET:  vegetarian 
 TITLE:  veggie packed breakfast wrap 
 INGREDIENTS: 
- 1 large whole wheat tortilla 
- 1 eggs (whole or whites) 
- 85.04 g cherry tomatoes, quartered 
- 28.34 g avocado 
- 28.34 g spinach 
- 1 scallion 
- 7.39 ml olive oil 
- salt and pepper 
 DIRECTIONS: 
- preheat oven to 350&deg. line a pan with parchment paper. lay out the tortillas on the pan, and crack one egg on each tortilla. season with salt and pepper. bake for 12 minutes, or until the eggs whites are set. 
- meanwhile, in a medium pan, heat the olive oil on medium heat. chop both the green and white part of the scallions and add to pan (saving some greens for garnish). add the spinach and cherry tomatoes to the pan and sauté for 2-3 minutes. remove from heat and set aside. 
- once the tortillas are out of the oven, evenly divide the sautéed veggies and avocado over each wrap. garnish with the scallion greens and serve! 
 CALORIES:  441.5 
 FAT:  19.1 
 CARBS:  43.0 
 PROTEIN:  24.9 
 PREP TIME:  25 
 TYPE:  breakfast_and_brunch 
 DIET:  vegetarian

name: carlos menu
recipes:
Here is a cohesive and harmonious menu for you:

 TITLE:  avocado tuna salad 
 INGREDIENTS: 
- 1/4 avocado 
- 90.71 g can albacore tuna in water, drained 
- 29.57 ml plain nonfat yogurt 
- 14.78 ml mustard 
- 2.46 ml lemon juice 
- salt and pepper, to taste 
- 1/4 hard boiled egg 
- 2 lettuce leaves 
 DIRECTIONS: 
- mash avocado and use as the base for your tuna salad. mix with all other ingredients. 
- serve with lettuce leaves. 
- garnish with slices of hard-boiled eggs. 
- great as a sandwich, too. 
 CALORIES:  303.1 
 FAT:  14.9 
 CARBS:  10.7 
 PROTEIN:  34.5 
 PREP TIME:  5 
 TYPE:  appetizer 
 DIET:  contains_meat 
 TITLE:  delicious chicken avocado 
 INGREDIENTS: 
- 1 boneless skinless chicken breast 
- 1 avocado 
- 1/4 tomatoes 
- pepper 
- italian seasoning 
- garlic 
- salt 
- lemon juice 
 DIRECTIONS: 
- season chicken breast with lemon juice, pepper, italian seasoning, garlic, and salt. grill or bake the chicken. 
- when chicken is done cooking, slice it into bite-size pieces. 
- dice the avocado and tomatoes. 
- in a bowl (preferably with a lid, as you'll be putting this in the fridge) mix the chicken, avocado, and tomatoes. 
- add more lemon juice, pepper, and garlic to taste. 
- refrigerate for 15 minutes before eating. 
 CALORIES:  372.4 
 FAT:  22.8 
 CARBS:  15.4 
 PROTEIN:  29.7 
 PREP TIME:  20 
 TYPE:  dinner 
 DIET:  contains_meat 
 TITLE:  light chocolate mousse with avocados and tofu 
 INGREDIENTS: 
- 1/4 bar silken tofu (1/4 of 12 ounce box) 
- 1/4 avocado 
- 2.46 ml vanilla extract 
- 7.39 ml unsweetened cocoa powder 
- 15.69 ml agave nectar 
- 4 ice cubes 
 DIRECTIONS: 
- blend all ingredients until smooth, starting with the soft tofu, then at the end adding the ice cubes. servings will depend on how much of the mixture you eat while blending. 
- has the flavor and consistency of chocolate ice cream. 
- the avocado &amp. tofu is the secret to a creamy &amp. rich chocolate mousse without all the fat! low calorie &amp. full of nutrients! delicious!!! 
- hint: may need to adjust any of the ingredients to your personal taste. 
 CALORIES:  232.2 
 FAT:  11.0 
 CARBS:  30.1 
 PROTEIN:  6.9 
 PREP TIME:  5 
 TYPE:  desert 
 DIET:  vegetarian
